name: Under Pressure (itch) (mallapp)
description:
What is this?

A short game made in 4h for the Trijam #161

What's the Goal?

Jump from platform to platform and get to the top of everything before being eaten by the ever rising water level.

Find valves on the way to reduce the water pressure - and the pressure on your ambitious self.

How to play?

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move the little guy with two eyes.

Is it difficult?

Yes, it's rage-inducingly difficult. Don't worry if you get angry and quit the game.
